title: Wonderful, long lasting products
text: 4 years ago I bought the Lip and Body Salve, Five Minute Forecast lotion and a bar of soap. The soap of course is gone. I use the lotion sparingly, because I love it so much. It still has a wonderful scent and feels great. I use the salve on my lips almost daily and there is still plenty. It just lasts all day and feels great.

title: Trip to Italy
text: 2nd time to fly BA and we were not disappointed. The Economy Plus service and food was excellent. Seats are better than Economy, not like Business or 1st Class, but better and makes a long journey tolerable. Will definitely use them again.

title: Too many delays
text: 1st flight of the day, we arrived very early, sat in the waiting area for some past scheduled take-off time and were finallly informed there was a maintenance issue and that we would be delayed up to another hour. Now we had a long lay-over in Dallas so it wasn't reallly an issue for us, but many did not have that luxury. Since the plane had been sitting on the tarmac over night why in the world did they not do the maintenance the night before, UNION issues. All thought it was ridiculous. This was only exceeded by the extended delay on our flight out of Dallas. Again we sat in the wiating area long past our scheduled take-off time. Boarded, got all settled and after sitting in the plane for some time we were notified there was an issue with the nose gear and it required that to service it the plane must be empty. We all had to deboard and wait again. I knew there was a reason I only fly American when it is the only choice for my trip.

title: Delicious ending to a meal
text: We didn't want a heavy dessert so opted for ice cream and it was an excellent choice. I got one scoop which was more than enough. My husband chose two and regretted it as they are large and he "had" to finish it all and it was more than enough. Their choices are varied and unique. They also had custom chocolates, teas and coffees that we didn't have time to sample.

title: Seafood delight
text: We dined at this delightful restaurant in their sidewalk dining area. The atmosphere was great and the food was delicious. My husband had their grouper stuffed with lump crab special and I had their crabcakes. We both enjoyed them immensely. The restaurant was a recommendation from a co-worker and we pass it on as an excellent dining choice.

title: Great Rehab facility
text: Not like the big commercial aquariums. This is a rehab facility that opens their doors to tourists to learn about what they are doing and see the animals. It is small, but mighty. Houses Winter and Hope from the Dolphin Tales movies. You can learn a lot in a short period of time.

title: Excellent evening at Bascom's
text: Delicious meal with excellent service. We were only in town for a couple of days and Bascom's was recommended to us. We had a reservation, but arrived about 30 minutes early to sit in the bar and enjoy a drink while we waited. We were offered to dine at the high top by our server and glad we chose that option. Our server Lee was excellent. He gave us great recommendations and was very friendly. Our food was excellent. The servings were so large we realized we could have split everything we ordered.

title: Tours in Tuscany treated us Royally
text: Our guides and tours were excellent. We totally enjoyed every place they took us and the knowledge they shared with us. I would highly recommend their services. The winery they took us to was beautiful and the lunch we were served was deliciou.s. And of course, the views were spectacular

title: Great Greek Street Food
text: We enjoyed the Chicken Souvlaki and a Chicken Gyro. Both were absolutely delicious. The service was a little slow, but our server offered us a complimentary dessert of Greek Yogurt and Honey which was equally delicious. Their location to the Planka and the Museum is excellent

title: Lovely hotel in a great location in Athens
text: From the moment we checked in the service couldn't have been better. The hotel is in a great location with a view of the Acropolis. They are home to The Point restaurant and bar which made for excellent dining with an incredible view. We don't usually tip the housekeepers, but their attention to detail motivated my husband to leave a tip. They took care of us on every level and we couldn't have been happier with our selection of hotels.

title: Outstanding food only surpassed by the view
text: We stayed at the Hotel Herodion which houses the Point a Bar and Restaurant. We initially went up for the view and a drink, but ended up eating dinner there all 3 nights. The meals were delicious and the service was outstanding. And how can you pass up dining in a place with aa view from their rooftop dining area like this?

title: Fresh Seafood right on the water
text: Our guide suggested we order from the fresh fish menu vs. the regular menu and it was a great recommendation. The Red Snapper was mild and the seasonings were wonderful. We also ordered a Greek Salad and the Crab Salad and they were both delicious The Crab Salad has a lot of mayonnaise so if you don't like mayonnaise you might pass on this. The garlic bread was wonderful too.

title: Outstanding Gelato
text: We had just spend 10 days in Italy trying Gelato everywhere, but this may have been the best we ever ate. Don't miss it if you see one of their stores.

title: Another example of historic beauty
text: To walk through the Acropolis is a trip in time. Listening to our guide and learning about the various changes through time of the facility was extremely interesting

title: Outstanding tour of Athens and the surrounding area
text: We thoroughly enjoyed the tours provided by Private Greece Tours. I visited with Nikos extensively via email prior to our trip and he arranged for us to see and experience everything we were interested in seeing. We had a driver and guide for each day and they were wonderful. They had a vast knowledge of the sites we visited and had great personalities which made our experience even better. George our driver and Katherine our guide on our first day, made our Athens and Sounion Tour outstanding. When they picked us up and we asked what we would be seeing they offered a multitude of suggestions and accommodated us in every way. Down to the BEST Gelato we have ever had. The next day we traveled with Dominic and Georgia was our guide, to see the Temple at Delphi, and again, it was a great day. I can't say enough about how much we enjoyed our tours with them and I highly recommend this service. We left feeling like we had made friends with our guides and drivers. They were very sincere and made us feel at home. Private Greece Tours will make your tour of Athens and Greece truly remarkable. I also, highly recommend the option they offer of not only having a knowledgeable driver, but also a guide. The guide can take you into the facilities and offer you a wealth of knowledge you just can't get by reading the signs. If you are going to travel to another country and see the sites it is well worth learning all you can from professionals.

title: Parthenon was outstanding
text: An incredible facility, so happy it has been maintained and is so beautiful to see. It is a must see when in Greece.

title: Wonderful winery tour
text: Wine was delicious. Tour was excellent and lunch was great. We sat outside on the patio. Wonderful atmosph8to relax, sip wine and dine. The dogs were great company too.

title: United Disappointment
text: Paid extra to sit in Economy Plus. We had used this level last year on British Air and it was excellent. A definite difference from regular Economy, better service, better food, more amenities and much larger and more comfortable seats. We expected the same on United and there was no difference other than we paid another $150 more per ticket than the row behind us. The seats, service, food and amenities were identical. I will not fly United again because of this. I replied to their survey with the same information and they never responded so they obviously didn't care too much. If you need a long flight definitely look at British Air instead.

title: Chocolate!!!
text: Great tour of chocolate factory. Tasting opportunity and chance to watch them make the candy. Super place to visit and shop
place: República del Cacao - Plaza de Armas

title: Much history
text: This was a beautiful place to visit. Lot's of people enjoying the city and the beautiful architecture.

title: Great Train trip
text: This was a great way to get to Machu Picchu. Not only do you not have to hike the entire way, but you get spectacular views of the mountains on your way up. The food was good and the service was excellent with great staff.

title: Beautiful scenic drive
text: Made this drive in the daytime and at night and it's a beatiful sight to see. Guide gave us several interesting facts about the drive.

title: Special place
text: All of this Inca relics are very special, hard to specify which one is better. if you can, go see everyting in the area.

title: Big City Tour
text: We had a previous layover in Lima and got caught in the traffic and nearly broke this appointment for a tour as it seemed to congested. We were really glad we didn't as our tour guide was great and showed us some great history of this large city. Lima is a great town and has a lot to offer. I would recommend this company as they were very accommodating.

title: Boutique Hotel
text: Esplendor is a great hotel. Near two squares with shops and dining, it is in a great city location.There are a great number of hotels in Cusco, but this one is very unique. They have excellent room service and the breakfast buffet is adequate, the staff is friendly and helpful. They offer spa services too.

title: Inca Destination
text: This was an amazing place. We had an excellent guide who told us so much about this history of the Inca and the Spaniards. Cusco is quite high so be prepared for the altitude. Despite taking all the precautions, medicine and Coca Tea I still got a pretty bad case of Altitude Sickness. Allow yourself enough time from arrival to the climb to acclimate to the altitude, but regardless it is well worth anything you might experience.
place: Machu Picchu Day Trip from Cusco

title: Fantastic Views
text: Had a wonderful dinner with amazing views of all of Quito from this hilltop restaurant. We went early allowing us to see the day time view and evening lights of Quito it was really special. Make a reservation as the restaurant is small and is very popular.

title: Nature at it's finest
text: The Amazon rain forest is amazing and if you like nature this must be on your to do list. While it can get very hot and humid it is worth it. You will see wildlife you can't imagine.

title: Fantastic Natural area
text: It is a spectacluar place to view animals, but invest in a guide.They will spot things you will never see and take you places off the beaten path you might not visit.

title: Amazing Lights
text: This is just a fun place to stop and look around. The lights are spectacular and you really know you are in the city when you visit Times Square

title: Horseback in the Park
text: Living in the country I have my own park, but in the city a park is a necessity and Central Park is amazing. We rode the horse and carriage around the park and it was great. I highly recommend this activity.

title: Climb to the top
text: We have been several times and if the top is open make the climb. We did it many years ago and it was well worth the steps. It isn't always open so check before you get excited about it, but it is very special. Being inside the statue and looking at it's construction really makes you appreciate it.

title: Theater at it's finest
text: If you like the theater, there is nothing like Broadway. We have been to several plays on Broadway over the years and the quality is incredible. The best entertainment money can buy.

title: Skating at it's finest
text: Waited at the restaurant for a fairly good time, but it was worth the wait as we were seated at a table right on the ice rink and got to enjoy seeing all the skaters. It was a great time. Plus, we got our photo taken with the beautiful tree in the background.

title: Need I say more about a very special place
text: This is a one of a kind place. Fifth Avenue with all it's glitz and glamour is just fun to walk down even if you don't live here or shop here.

title: Stock Market at it's finest
text: My husband is a financial consultant, so for him to see Wall Street was extra special. It's a must see visit for anyone in the business industry

title: History revealed
text: We are all here as the result of immigrants and seeing all the history stored in Ellis Island is fantastic. Shows the determination of people seeking a new life. Beautiful building and amazing details

title: Special Experience
text: Having seen this in photos it's one of those places you have to ride on to experience. Amazing structure

title: Christmas in New York
text: Had the opportunity to see the Rockettes near Christmas season at Radio City Music Hall. Not only is The Rockette's Christmas program spectacular, but you also get to see the fantastic Radio City Music Hall in person.

title: Iconic Skyline
text: Living in a small town, it's great to visit a big city, just visit, and seeing New York from the Harbor is an extra special way to view this sprawling metropolis

title: interesting place
text: Love the history associated with Penn Station. One of the places everyone needs to visit at least once

title: Quite Unique location in Quito
text: While this Basilica was closed the day we visited it was well worth going to see the exterior. The gorgoyles all depict wildlife of the Ecuadorian Amazon and it's a treat to look for each unique species

title: Beautiful Basilica
text: Amazing gold leaf covering everything inside. A true work of art. There an amzing out of facilities like this in Quito, but this one was outstanding.
place: Iglesia y Convento de San Francisco

title: Beautiful view of the bay
text: Wonderful place to dine, service was great and vrey friendly. Good way to end a busy day with a great meal.

title: Great Place to see Natural Alaska
text: A great way to see a lot of nature in a small place. Since Alaska gets frequent rains it is a wonderful way to spend an afternoon.
place: Alaska Islands and Ocean Visitor Center

title: Great Cajun Chicken
text: Granted it's just a chain chicken place, but it always has a great flavor and they mix up there meny to give you a good selection

title: Best customer service
text: The food is traditional Jaliscience flavor. Not your typical Tex-Mex so it makes for a great change for Mexican food. The owner/manager is constantly circling the room and greeting the guests. He always asks if everything is Great and if it's not he makes sure that it is fixed.

title: Flight to Nairobi
text: First time to fly on BA and while we didn't want to pay for Business or First Class we paid for the upgrade to Premium Economy and it was well worth it. The food and service were great.

title: You can't won't find warmer hospitality or a better view anywhere.
text: Stayed at The Cliffhanger year before last and we still talk about how wonderful it was. Sue is a gracious hostess and outstanding cook. She probably has the most gorgeous view of any private residence in all of Alaska. We are so grateful she shared her home with us.

title: Animals up close and personal
text: Steve and his staff are quite the characters and give you a great learning experience. Make reservations before you leave home as they keep the crowd small and intimate

title: Quick way to get to your next destination
text: Fun way to travel and see the sites at the same time. Easy means of transportation for any traveler.

title: Great opportunity to learn about native wildlife
text: Enjoyed seeing the eagles, the museum and the other animails being rehabilitated at their facility. Great place to sit and watch a demonstration after a day of walking.

title: Great food with a local flair
text: Enjoyed eating where the locals recommend you eat. People were friendlly and the food was tasty. In the downtown area and easy to walk to.

title: Porini Amboseli was outstanding
text: Granted this was our first Safari and 1st of 4 Porini camps we were to stay in so we had nothing to compare it to, but this camp exceeded any of our expectations. From the initial Jambo greeting we were made to feel like we were the only people they were hosting. They did everything they could to make us comfortable and have a wonderful Safari experience. The food was outstanding, especially when you consider we were out in the bush. Their culinary schooled chef provided healthy and delicious meals. While we had no special dietary needs some did and they were treated to exceptional meals that met their requirements. The Safaris were unbelievable and our guides went out of their way to insure we saw all the game we hoped to see.

title: Beautiful way to see Amboseli National Park
text: This gave you a great opportunity to see Amboseli from high above the plains. You could see for miles and enjoy the animals as they interacted in their natural environment

title: Conservation at it's finest
text: The conservancy offers you an opportunity to get a little closer to the animals than in the park and demonstrates how valuable a conservancy is to save the wildlife and their habitat.

title: Porini Rhino Experience
text: This was our second of 4 Porini camps to visit and totally unique from our 1st camp. Again, we received outstanding service, food and guiding. The guides were so informative and taught us so much about the wildlife and the culture of the area. They found several White and Black Rhino for us to observe which made the visit outstanding. I never knew you could stay in a tent and feel like you were at home in your own bed. The hot water bottle in the turned down bed was the cherry on top.

title: Porini Mara a totally different experience
text: Porini Mara was our third of 4 Porini Camps to visit. I feel like we entered a totally different world from the 1st two camps. The terrain was different, but the excellent service was the same. We were enthusiastically greeted upon arrival and equally so each time we returned to camp from a game drive. If we didn't have a beverage in our hand we were immediately offered one. We never "wanted" for anything. Our guides went out of their way to make sure we could see all the wildlife we came to Africa to see. They knew all about the animals and information we didn't know to ask for they shared with us to insure we learned all we could. The excellent food continued at this camp, just like the others. The consistancy of service between the camps is exceptional.

title: Beautiful conservancy
text: This conservancy is another example of the exceptional efforts being made to conserve the wildlife of Africa and it's habitat. They are working side by side with the Maasai people to sustain the land. Their efforts are to be commended.
